sense.gloss: moderate, reserved, conservative, humble, mild-mannered, self-effacing, unassuming, well-behaved, low-key, temperate, in small quantities

sdata.j: たくさん↑作↑↓つく↓っても↑捌↑↓さば↓ききれないから、|↑控↑↓ひか↓えめ|にね。
sdata.e: If you make too many, we won't be able to sell them all, so don't go wild.

sdata.j: タバコはもっと|↑控↑↓ひか↓えめ|に。
sdata.e: You should refrain from smoking more.

sdata.j: お↑酒↑↓さけ↓は|↑控↑↓ひか↓えめ|に。
